original: At the first God made the heaven and the earth.
translation: In die begin het God die hemel en die aarde geskep.

original: And the earth was waste and without form; and it was dark on the face of the deep: and the Spirit of God was moving on the face of the waters.
translation: Die aarde was leeg en sonder vorm; dit was donker oor die diepte; en God se Gees het op die waters beweeg.

original: And God said, Let there be light: and there was light.
translation: En God het gesê, Laat daar lig wees: en daar was lig.

original: His offering was one silver plate, a hundred and thirty shekels in weight, one silver basin of seventy shekels, by the scale of the holy place; the two of them full of the best meal mixed with oil for a meal offering;
translation: Sy aanbieding was 'n silwer skottel wat honderdtwintig shekels geweeg het, en 'n silwer basin wat sewentig shekels geweeg het, volgens die maatstaf van die heilige plek; albei was vol van die beste meel gemeng met olie vir 'n graanaanbieding.

original: One gold spoon of ten shekels, full of spice;
translation: Een goue lepel van tien shekels, vol speserye;

original: And David said to Ahimelech the priest, The king has given me orders and has said to me, Say nothing to anyone about the business on which I am sending you and the orders I have given you: and a certain place has been fixed to which the young men are to go.
translation: En David het vir Ahimelech die priester gesê: Die koning het vir my opdragte gegee en gesê: Moet met niemand praat oor wat ek jou stuur om te doen en die opdragte wat ek jou gegee het nie; daar is 'n spesifieke plek waarheen die jong mense moet gaan.

original: So now, if you have here five cakes of bread, give them into my hand, or whatever you have.
translation: As jy vyf brode hier het, gee dit in my hand of enigiets anders wat jy het.

original: And a third are to be stationed at the king's house; and a third at the doorway of the horses: while all the people are waiting in the open spaces round the house of the Lord.
translation: En 'n derde moet by die koning se huis gaan staan; en 'n derde by die deur van die perde, terwyl al die mense in die oop ruimtes rondom die huis van die Here wag.

original: May that man be like the towns overturned by the Lord without mercy: let a cry for help come to his ears in the morning, and the sound of war in the middle of the day;
translation: Mag daardie man wees soos die dorpe wat deur die Here omgekeer is, sonder genade: laat 'n hulp roep in sy ore kom in die oggend, en die geluid van oorlog gedurende die dag;

original: Because he did not put me to death before my birth took place: so my mother's body would have been my last resting-place, and she would have been with child for ever.
translation: Omdat hy my nie doodgemaak het voordat ek gebore is nie: dan sou my ma se liggaam my laaste plek van rus gewees het, en sy sou vir altyd swanger gewees het.

original: Or which of you, if his son makes a request for bread, will give him a stone?
translation: Of watter een van julle, as sy seun vir brood vra, sal vir hom 'n klip gee?

original: Or if he makes a request for a fish, will give him a snake?
translation: Of as hy vir 'n vis vra, sal hy vir hom 'n slang gee?

original: And while they were going on their way, they came to some water, and the Ethiopian said, See, here is water; why may I not have baptism?
translation: Terwyl hulle op pad was, het hulle by 'n stuk water gekom, en die Ethiopian het gesê: "Kyk, hier is water; hoekom mag ek nie gedoop word nie?"
Sorry, there doesn't seem to be any text provided for translation. Please provide the text you'd like me to translate.

original: And he gave orders for the carriage to be stopped, and the two of them went down into the water, and Philip gave him baptism.
translation: Hy het gesê dat die kar moet stop, en hulle het albei in die water gegaan, en Filippus het hom gedoop.

original: Give praise to the Lord, O my soul; let everything in me give praise to his holy name.
translation: Loof die Here, my siel; laat alles in my God se heilige naam prysgee.

original: Give praise to the Lord, O my soul; let not all his blessings go from your memory.
translation: Gee prys aan die Here, my siel; vergeet nooit al die seëninge wat Hy vir jou gegee het.
